healingstaff.desc:
A staff that increases the effectiveness of magical healing.
White Magic Heal +10.

hexlockshield.name: Hexlock Shield
hexlockshield.desc: A Shield offering strong protection and resilience.

ironshield.name: Iron Shield
ironshield.desc: A wrought-iron shield. The standard for defense.

kadmosshield.name: Kadmos Shield
kadmosshield.desc:
A Shield that can stop armor-piercing attacks.
Nullifies effectiveness against armored units.

knowledgegem.name: Knowledge Gem
knowledgegem.desc:
A mysterious gem that supports skill acquisition.
Doubles skill and class mastery experience gained.

lamposshield.name: Lampos Shield
lamposshield.desc:
A Shield that offers divine protection for steeds.
Nullifies extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

leathershield.name: Leather Shield
leathershield.desc: A shield made of leather. Simple but sturdy.

magicstaff.name: Magic Staff
magicstaff.desc:
A staff that guides the use of magic.
Magic Atk +3.

marchring.name: March Ring
marchring.desc:
A ring that increases movement.
Movement +1.

prayerring.name: Prayer Ring
prayerring.desc:
A ring imbued with the prayers of a saint.
Grants the Miracle ability. Restores 5 HP each turn.

silvershield.name: Silver Shield
silvershield.desc: A Shield made of shining silver.

speedring.name: Speed Ring
speedring.desc:
A ring that increases speed.
Speed +2.

steelshield.name: Steel Shield
steelshield.desc: A weighty shield offering strong protection.

whitedragonscarf.name: White Dragon Scarf
whitedragonscarf.desc:
An embroidered scarf honoring the Immaculate One.
Charm +2.

caduceusstaff.name: Caduceus Staff
caduceusstaff.desc:
A Sacred Staff linked to the Crest of Cethleann.
Magic attack range +1. Restores HP every turn, effects are enhanced for Crest bearers.

ochainshield.name: Ochain Shield
ochainshield.desc:
A Sacred Shield linked to the Crest of Cichol.
Negates enemy critical chance. Restores HP every turn, effects are enhanced for Crest bearers.

seirosshield.name: Seiros Shield
seirosshield.desc:
A Sacred Shield linked to the Crest of Seiros.
Halves monster damage. Restores HP every turn, effects are enhanced for Crest bearers.

aegisshield.name: Aegis Shield
aegisshield.desc:
A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Fraldarius.
May halve damage taken if the user bears the Crest of Fraldarius.

darkaegisshield.name: Dark Aegis Shield
darkaegisshield.desc:
Replica. A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Fraldarius.
May halve damage taken if the user bears the Crest of Fraldarius.

darkrafailgem.name: Dark Rafail Gem
darkrafailgem.desc:
Replica. A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Lamine.
Nullifies user's movement-type weaknesses. Negates enemy critical chance. May halve damage taken if user also bears the Crest of Lamine.

darkthyrsus.name: Dark Thyrsus
darkthyrsus.desc:
Replica. A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Gloucester.
Magic attack range +2. May halve damage taken if the user also bears the Crest of Gloucester.

fettersofdromi.name: Fetters of Dromi
fettersofdromi.desc:
A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Aubin.
Movement +1. Grants Canto. May halve damage taken if user also bears the Crest of Aubin.

rafailgem.name: Rafail Gem
rafailgem.desc:
A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Lamine.
Nullifies user's movement-type weaknesses. Negates enemy critical chance. May halve damage taken if user also bears the Crest of Lamine.

thyrsus.name: Thyrsus
thyrsus.desc:
A Hero's Relic linked to the Crest of Gloucester.
Magic attack range +2. May halve damage taken if the user also bears the Crest of Gloucester.

beginnerseal.name: Beginner Seal
beginnerseal.desc: Allows unit to take the certification exam for a beginner class.

intermediateseal.name: Intermediate Seal
intermediateseal.desc: Allows unit to take the certification exam for an intermediate class.

advancedseal.name: Advanced Seal
advancedseal.desc: Allows unit to take the certification exam for an Advanced class.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Allows unit to take the certification exam for a master class.

darkseal.name: Dark Seal
darkseal.desc: Allows unit to take the certification exam for a class that uses dark magic.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: A blazing flame that increases visibility in heavy fog.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: Use to remove the effects of poison.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Use to temporarily increase resistance by 7. Effect gradually wears off as turn count increases.

masterkey.name: Master Key
masterkey.desc: A key for unlocking doors or chests.

bullion.name: Bullion
bullion.desc: A gold bullion that sells for a high price at shops.

largebullion.name: Large Bullion
largebullion.desc: A gold bullion that sells for a very high price at shops.

extralargebullion.name: Extra Large Bullion
extralargebullion.desc: A gold bullion that sells for an extremely high price at shops.

fruitoflife.name: Fruit of Life
fruitoflife.desc: Permanently increases HP by 1. A curious fruit said to extend one's lifespan.

premiummagicherbs.name: Premium Magic Herbs
premiummagicherbs.desc: Permanently increases magic by 1. A collection of especially pure magical herbs.

ailellpomegranate.name: Ailell Pomegranate
ailellpomegranate.desc: Permanently increases dexterity by 1. Pomegranate that flourishes in harsh conditions.

speedcarrot.name: Speed Carrot
speedcarrot.desc: Permanently increases speed by 1. Even among carrots, it grants especially fast feet.

miraclebean.name: Miracle Bean
miraclebean.desc: Permanently increases luck by 1. A delicious bean from a plant that appeared overnight.

ambrosia.name: Ambrosia
ambrosia.desc: Permanently increases defense by 1. A medicinal herb that can be used as a body salve.

whiteverona.name: White Verona
whiteverona.desc: Permanently increases resistance by 1. A rare variety of verona.

goldenapple.name: Golden Apple
goldenapple.desc: Permanently increases charm by 1. An apple said to be blessed by the goddess.

tacticsprimer.name: Tactics Primer
tacticsprimer.desc: A book containing the basics of tactics. It doesn't look like it's been read much.

classiccookbook.name: Classic Cookbook
classiccookbook.desc: Cooking recipes said to have been used since long ago. This will probably help the head chef.

tantalizingcookbook.name: Tantalizing Cookbook
tantalizingcookbook.desc: Cooking recipes that make you hungry just reading them. This will probably help the head chef.

illustratedcookbook.name: Illustrated Cookbook
illustratedcookbook.desc: Cooking recipes said with illustrations that make it easy to follow. You feel that even you could cook with this.

whetstone.name: Whetstone
whetstone.desc: A stone used to sharpen the blades of swords or lances. Appreciated by those who enjoy weapon maintenance.

smallfodlancarp.name: Small Fódlan Carp
smallfodlancarp.desc: A fish caught in the fishing tournament. It is small in size.

ancientcoin.name: Ancient Coin
ancientcoin.desc: A coin said to have been used as a currency in ancient times. Appreciated by those who enjoy traveling, art, or coins.

armoredbearstuffy.name: Armored Bear Stuffy
armoredbearstuffy.desc: A fluffy stuffed bear wearing distinguished armor. Appreciated by those who love animals or cute things.

owlfeather.name: Owl Feather
owlfeather.desc: A feather from a messenger owl that can be used in a variety of ways. Appreciated by everyone.

ridingboots.name: Riding Boots
ridingboots.desc: Boots specially made for mastering the equestrian arts. Appreciated by those who enjoy horseback riding.

rose.name: Rose
rose.desc: Grown sometimes in Fódlan. Appreciated by those who like flowers.

lavender.name: Lavender
lavender.desc: Grown all across Fódlan. Appreciated by those who like flowers.

violet.name: Violet
violet.desc: Grown all across Fódlan. Appreciated by those who like flowers.

regularfodlancarp.name: Regular Fódlan Carp
regularfodlancarp.desc: A fish caught in the fishing tournament. It is roughly average in size.

largefodlancarp.name: Large Fódlan Carp
largefodlancarp.desc: A fish caught in the fishing tournament. It is large in size.

choirsignupsheet.name: Choir Sign Up Sheet
choirsignupsheet.desc: A list of students from the Black Eagle/Blue Lion/Golden Deer House who wish to participate in choir practice.

dissidentsintel.name: Dissidents Intel
dissidentsintel.desc: Some are unsatisfied with the way the church has been doing things. Are they part of the Western Church?.

elegantteaset.name: Elegant Tea set
elegantteaset.desc: A tea set entrusted to you by Ferdinand. He wants you to give it to someone who appreciates tea.

investigationnote#1.name: Investigation Note #1
investigationnote#1.desc: A summary of Hanneman's testimony. It seems others cannot use his research tools.

investigationnote#2.name: Investigation Note #2
investigationnote#2.desc: A summary of Alois's testimony. It seems there will be increased guards around the Goddess Tower.

investigationnote#3.name: Investigation Note #3
investigationnote#3.desc: A summary of the knight's testimony. It seems the Holy Mausoleum will be open to the public for the Rite.

investigationnote#4.name: Investigation Note #4
investigationnote#4.desc: A summary of the priest's testimony. Apparently there aren't any valuables in the treasure vault.

investigationnote#5.name: Investigation Note #5
investigationnote#5.desc: A summary of the knight's testimony. Apparently there are items of value in the kitchen, but nothing worth stealing.

investigationnote#6.name: Investigation Note #6
investigationnote#6.desc: A summary of the monk's testimony. Apparently valuable tomes can be read without the need to steal them.

investigationnote#7.name: Investigation Note #7
investigationnote#7.desc: A summary of the monk's testimony. Apparently the plants in the greenhouse hold intrinsic and personal value.

thievesintel.name: Thieves Intel
thievesintel.desc: A warning for anyone heading to Conand Tower. It seems some thieves have made the tower their hideout.

enlighteningherbs.name: Enlightening Herbs
enlighteningherbs.desc: Herbs for people who want to escape into the world of dreams. Will leave them feeling rested and refreshed. (Black Eagle Route only).

braveryherbs.name: Bravery Herbs
braveryherbs.desc: Herbs for people who are too nervous to speak to others. Will grant them the courage to strike up a conversation. (Black Eagle Route Only).

fortifyingherbs.name: Fortifying Herbs
fortifyingherbs.desc: Herbs for people who can't overcome feelings of sadness. Will help them feel at ease. (Blue Lion Route Only).

calmingherbs.name: Calming Herbs
calmingherbs.desc: Herbs for people who can't help but make mistakes. Will make them a little calmer and more careful. (Blue Lion Route Only).

admiringloveletter.name: Admiring Love Letter
admiringloveletter.desc: "You're always putting your all into your work. You're not very up-front with your feelings, but you're so adorable!".

birthingherbs.name: Birthing Herbs
birthingherbs.desc: Medicinal herbs said to aid in the safe delivery of babies. They're extremely effective. Strong enough for a horse.

heartfeltloveletter.name: Heartfelt Love Letter
heartfeltloveletter.desc: "You're so gallant, and you love your family. Your smile is just so wonderful and charming, I think I'm in love!".

reverentloveletter.name: Reverent Love Letter
reverentloveletter.desc: "I can't help the way I feel about you! I've fallen for a high-class person that I shouldn't have fallen in love with!".

crestologicalmysteries.name: Crestological Mysteries
crestologicalmysteries.desc: A book introducing some obscure theories about Crests. Someone with a passion for that topic might want this.

tomeofcomelysaints.name: Tome of Comely Saints
tomeofcomelysaints.desc: A book filled with striking illustrations of the male saints. Someone who admires good-looking men might want this.

fireamulet.name: Fire Amulet
fireamulet.desc: A handy charm that came from somewhere faraway. Someone from a foreign land might want this.

glowingstone.name: Glowing Stone
glowingstone.desc: A lovely stone emitting a soft light. Someone who is gentle and calm might want this.

thepathofdawn.name: The Path of Dawn
thepathofdawn.desc: Record of a quiet, fleeting dawn. Someone who loves nature might want this.

medicinaleyedrops.name: Medicinal Eyedrops
medicinaleyedrops.desc: Eye drops necessary for any book lover. Someone passionate about reading might want them.

twotonedwhetstone.name: Two-Toned Whetstone
twotonedwhetstone.desc: A black-and-white whetstone suitable for sharpening a prized weapon. Catherine and Shamir both want this.

brigidtechniques.name: Brigid Techniques
brigidtechniques.desc: A book of traditional, time-honored woodworking techniques from the Brigid Archipelago.

imperialarmyintel.name: Imperial Army Intel
imperialarmyintel.desc: It seems the Imperial army has been disguising themselves as merchants and pilgrims and frequenting Garreg Mach.

cornerstonefragment.name: Cornerstone Fragment
cornerstonefragment.desc: A fragment of stone that has existed since the monastery's foundation. It shows the wear of time.

zoltansbeastidol.name: Zoltan's Beast Idol
zoltansbeastidol.desc: A valuable idol created by the master craftsman Zoltan, who was widely thought to have only made weapons.

annassecretthingy.name: Anna's Secret Thingy
annassecretthingy.desc: The mysterious object that Anna needs to open her Secret Shop. It's too incredible to behold.

lavandulagrass.name: Lavandula grass
lavandulagrass.desc: An herb with tiny, purple flowers. Its calming scent relieves stress.

gladiolus.name: Gladiolus
gladiolus.desc: Flowers used as an offering for those who died in war. The flowers are colorful, but the leaves are sharp as blades.

letterfromflayn.name: Letter from Flayn
letterfromflayn.desc: On behalf of all, I wish you a most joyous day of birth! I ask that you spend it in absolute tranquility.

letterfromgilbert.name: Letter from Gilbert
letterfromgilbert.desc: We should all be grateful that you were born and found your way here. I mean that.

thewealthofanna.name: The Wealth of Anna
thewealthofanna.desc: A mysterious notebook Anna gave to a girl. It doesn't seem right to flip through it...

abyssinformation.name: Abyss Information
abyssinformation.desc: Information about the Abyss from Anna. It seems to be a dangerous place that regular folks tend to avoid.

saintcethleannshard.name: Saint Cethleann Shard
saintcethleannshard.desc: A strange stone shard that seems to have fallen off the statue of Saint Cethleann.

saintcicholshard.name: Saint Cichol Shard
saintcicholshard.desc: A strange stone shard that seems to have fallen off the statue of Saint Cichol.

saintmacuilshard.name: Saint Macuil Shard
saintmacuilshard.desc: A strange stone shard that seems to have fallen off the statue of Saint Macuil.

saintindechshard.name: Saint Indech Shard
saintindechshard.desc: A strange stone shard that seems to have fallen off the statue of Saint Indech.

hugefodlancarp.name: Huge Fódlan Carp
hugefodlancarp.desc: A fish caught in the fishing tournament. It is very large in size.

teutatesherring.name: Teutates Herring
teutatesherring.desc: A fish caught in the fishing tournament. Apparently it's a rare, large herring.

missingstudentposter.name: Missing Student Poster
missingstudentposter.desc: A torn poster soliciting information on a missing student. It says the student disappeared a few nights ago.

servantssupplies.name: Servant's Supplies
servantssupplies.desc: A bag filled with everything a servant would need to serve a noble. There's even a sword sticking out of it.

valerian.name: Valerian
valerian.desc: Flowers intended to be laid on a certain grave. A bouquet of lovely, pale pink flowers in bloom.

listofrarebooks.name: List of Rare Books
listofrarebooks.desc: A list of books thought to have been removed from the monastery library. What could they contain?.

atreatiseonetiquette.name: A Treatise on Etiquette
atreatiseonetiquette.desc: A book detailing the etiquette of high society. It probably belongs to someone who is acutely aware of their nobility.

agriculturalsurvey.name: Agricultural Survey
agriculturalsurvey.desc: An old paper with writings about harvesting and taxation. It probably belongs to a young noble who owns territory.

animalbonedice.name: Animal Bone Dice
animalbonedice.desc: Cubic dice made from animal bones. They probably belong to someone who enjoys weird games.

animatedbait.name: Animated Bait
animatedbait.desc: Fishing bait that has been magically animated. It probably belongs to an experienced magic user who loves fishing.

annotateddictionary.name: Annotated Dictionary
annotateddictionary.desc: A dictionary of a foreign language' with translations. It probably belongs to someone from afar.

antiqueclasp.name: Antique Clasp
antiqueclasp.desc: An expensive-looking clasp with an outdated design. It probably belongs to someone who is not up on trends.

armorclasp.name: Armor Clasp
armorclasp.desc: A clasp used to connect various pieces of armor. It probably belongs to someone who favors black armor.

artbook.name: Art Book
artbook.desc: A book about art movements in Fódlan over the centuries. It probably belongs to someone who is interested in art.

artificialflower.name: Artificial Flower
artificialflower.desc: Bright red cloth formed into the shape of a rose. It probably belongs to someone who wears flashy clothes.

badgeofgraduation.name: Badge of Graduation
badgeofgraduation.desc: A badge awarded for graduation from the Garreg Mach Officers Academy. It probably belongs to a graduate.

bagofseeds.name: Bag of Seeds
bagofseeds.desc: A bag containing seeds that birds and mice would eat. It probably belongs to someone who cares for animals.

bagoftealeaves.name: Bag of Tea Leaves
bagoftealeaves.desc: A small bag containing a mixed variety of tea leaves. It probably belongs to someone who is interested in tea.

balancescale.name: Balance Scale
balancescale.desc: A precious tool used for measuing the weight of objects. It probably belongs to someone in need of accuracy.

basketofberries.name: Basket of Berries
basketofberries.desc: A basket heaped with wild berries. It probably belongs to someone who is nostalgic for the flavors of the forest.

bigspoon.name: Big Spoon
bigspoon.desc: A spoon big enough to ladle out a person's entire portion with one scoop. It probably belongs to a big eater.

blackhairtie.name: Black Hair Tie
blackhairtie.desc: A thick string used to control unruly hair. It probably belongs to someone who ties their hair back.

blackironspur.name: Black Iron Spur
blackironspur.desc: An item awarded during Kingdom knighting ceremonies. It probably belongs to someone closely related to a knight.

blackleathergloves.name: Black Leather Gloves
blackleathergloves.desc: High-quality leather gloves for wearing under gauntlets. They probably belong to someone picky about armor.

bluestone.name: Blue Stone
bluestone.desc: A rare blue stone that could be ground into a pigment. It probably belongs to someone who likes to paint.

boardgamepiece.name: Board Game Piece
boardgamepiece.desc: A high-quality board game piece, make of precious stone. It probably belongs to someone with a tactical mind.

bookofghoststories.name: Book of Ghost Stories
bookofghoststories.desc: A collection of terrifying tales from all over Fódlan. It probably belongs to someone who likes ghost stories.

bundleofdryhemp.name: Bundle of Dry Hemp
bundleofdryhemp.desc: A bundle of hemp that can be used to make bowstrings. It probably belongs to someone who is skilled with a bow.

bundleofherbs.name: Bundle of Herbs
bundleofherbs.desc: A bundle of inexpensive herbs used in cooking. It probably belongs to someone who knows a lot about plants.

burlapsackofrocks.name: Burlap Sack of Rocks
burlapsackofrocks.desc: A heavy sack filled to the brim with rocks. It probably belongs to someone who likes training their muscles.

carvinghammer.name: Carving Hammer
carvinghammer.desc: A carving hammer used to strike a chisel. It probably belongs to someone who is interested in woodcarving.

centipedepicture.name: Centipede Picture
centipedepicture.desc: A sketch of a centipede with countless little holes in it. It probably belongs to someone who hates insects.

cleandustingcloth.name: Clean Dusting Cloth
cleandustingcloth.desc: An unsoiled dusting cloth that has clearly never been used. It probably belongs to someone who hates cleaning.

confessionalletter.name: Confessional Letter
confessionalletter.desc: A letter confessing offenses to the goddess. It probably belongs to someone who feels deeply repentant.

crudearrowheads.name: Crude Arrowheads
crudearrowheads.desc: Rough-hewn arrowheads fashioned from rocks. They probably belong to someone who favors the bow.

crumpledloveletter.name: Crumpled Love Letter
crumpledloveletter.desc: A carelessly discarded love letter. It probably belongs to someone with a complicated love life.

currycomb.name: Curry Comb
currycomb.desc: A comb decorated with pegasi, used for grooming horses. It probably belongs to someone who cares for horses.

dulledlongsword.name: Dulled Longsword
dulledlongsword.desc: A worn iron longsword that feels quite heavy. It seems like something Dimitri would own.

dustybookoffables.name: Dusty Book of Fables
dustybookoffables.desc: A well-loved book of children's fables. It probably belongs to someone who has fond memories associated with it.

easternporcelain.name: Eastern Porcelain
easternporcelain.desc: A gift container said to have been made in the far east. It probably belongs to a person of high class.

eleganthairclip.name: Elegant Hair Clip
eleganthairclip.desc: An elegant white hair clip, likely belonging to someone with grace. A lovely gift for most anyone.

encyclopediaofsweets.name: Encyclopedia of Sweets
encyclopediaofsweets.desc: A book describing sweet treats from all across Fódlan. It probably belongs to someone who adores sweets.

evilrepellingamulet.name: Evil-Repelling Amulet
evilrepellingamulet.desc: An amulet imbued with holy magic that wards off evil. It probably belongs to someone who is afraid of ghosts.

exoticfeather.name: Exotic Feather
exoticfeather.desc: A decorative feather from a rare bird found in Brigid. It probably belongs to someone who used to live there.

fadedstarchart.name: Faded Star Chart
fadedstarchart.desc: A star chart that was created by the church. It probably belongs to someone who knows a lot about stars.

featherpillow.name: Feather Pillow
featherpillow.desc: A pillow stuffed with soft bird feathers. It probably belongs to someone who is picky about their bedding.

foldingrazor.name: Folding Razor
foldingrazor.desc: A meticulously sharpened straight-blade razor. It probably belongs to a gentleman who prefers a close shave.

foreigngoldcoin.name: Foreign Gold Coin
foreigngoldcoin.desc: An unusual gold coin engraved with mysterious letters. It probably belongs to someone who likes collecting coins.

fruitpreserves.name: Fruit Preserves
fruitpreserves.desc: Bottled fruit preserved in sugar. It probably belongs to someone who enjoys baking or eating sweets.

furscarf.name: Fur Scarf
furscarf.desc: A wolf pelt sewn into the shape of a scarf. It probably belongs to someone affiliated with a village of hunters.

gardeningshears.name: Gardening Shears
gardeningshears.desc: A pair of shears specially designed for pruning plants. They probably belong to someone who gardens as a hobby.

goldearring.name: Gold Earring
goldearring.desc: An earring featuring traditional Duscur designs. It probably belongs to someone from the Duscur region.

groundingcharm.name: Grounding Charm
groundingcharm.desc: A charm said to prevent lightning from striking nearby. It probably belongs to someone who is afraid of lightning.

hammerandchisel.name: Hammer and Chisel
hammerandchisel.desc: A sturdy wooden hammer and metal chisel. They probably belong to someone who frequently conducts research.

handdrawnmap.name: Hand Drawn Map
handdrawnmap.desc: A practical map of the forest made by Jeralt. It probably belongs to someone who has known Jeralt for a long time.

handmadehairclip.name: Handmade Hair Clip
handmadehairclip.desc: A cute, but incomplete, hair accessory. It probably belongs to someone who is good at making accessories.

hedgehogcase.name: Hedgehog Case
hedgehogcase.desc: An accessory case embroided with a cute hedgehog. It probably belongs to a female noble.

howtobakesweets.name: How to Bake Sweets
howtobakesweets.desc: A note about how to make simple baked sweets. It probably belongs to someone who enjoys baking.

howtobetidy.name: How to be Tidy
howtobetidy.desc: A book containing tips for keeping things tidy. It probably belongs to someone who has a hard time cleaning.

hresvelgtreatise.name: Hresvelg Treatise
hresvelgtreatise.desc: A treatise compiled during the life of Emperor Wilhelm. It probably belongs to a proponent of devious tactics.

introductiontomagic.name: Introduction to Magic
introductiontomagic.desc: A simple and easy to understand textbook on magic. It probably belongs to someone who is not good at magic.

ironcookingpot.name: Iron Cooking Pot
ironcookingpot.desc: A durable iron pot showing no signs of use. It probably belongs to someone who is picky about cooking utensils.

jarofsweets.name: Jar of Sweets
jarofsweets.desc: A jar filled with sweets. It probably belongs to someone with a sweet tooth.

joustingalmanac.name: Jousting Almanac
joustingalmanac.desc: A record of jousting matches held in Faerghus. It probably belongs to someone who looks up to knights.

leatherbowsheath.name: Leather Bow Sheath
leatherbowsheath.desc: A leather bow sheath engraved with an unfamiliar script. It seems like something Claude would own.

lenscloth.name: Lens Cloth
lenscloth.desc: A clean white cloth decorated with fine embroidery. It probably belongs to someone who wears glasses.

lettertorhea.name: Letter to Rhea
lettertorhea.desc: A letter that seems to be written to Rhea. It probably belongs to someone with a deep connection to Rhea.

lettertothegoddess.name: Letter to the Goddess
lettertothegoddess.desc: An impassioned letter written to the goddess. It probably belongs to someone who daydreams about the goddess.

lightpurpleveil.name: Light Purple Veil
lightpurpleveil.desc: A headscarf that has been dyed purple. It probably belongs to someone who likes fashion.

lovelycomb.name: Lovely Comb
lovelycomb.desc: A beautiful red comb made from tortoiseshell. It probably belongs to someone who takes care of their long hair.

maintenanceoil.name: Maintenance Oil
maintenanceoil.desc: A jar containing oil for weapon maintenance. It probably belongs to someone who collects weapons.

makeupbrush.name: Makeup brush
makeupbrush.desc: A thin brush for applying makeup around the eyes. It probably belongs to someone who wears eyeshadow.

mildstomachpoison.name: Mild Stomach Poison
mildstomachpoison.desc: A small bottle labeled "Mild Stomach Poison" that seems fairly harmless. It probably belongs to a schemer.

moonknightstale.name: Moon Knight's Tale
moonknightstale.desc: A story recorded during the Crescent Moon War. It probably belongs to someone who reads tales of chivalry.

mysteriousnotebook.name: Mysterious Notebook
mysteriousnotebook.desc: A notebook full of cheesy jokes and bad puns. It probably belongs to someone who likes telling jokes.

needleandthread.name: Needle and Thread
needleandthread.desc: A needle and a spool of thread. They probably belong to someone who hides away doing needlework.

newbottleofperfume.name: New Bottle of Perfume
newbottleofperfume.desc: An unopened bottle containing fancy perfume. It probably belongs to someone who doesn't often wear perfume.

noselesspuppet.name: Noseless Puppet
noselesspuppet.desc: An exquisitely crafted, but incomplete, wooden puppet. It probably belongs to someone who enjoys woodcarving.

noxioushandkerchief.name: Noxious Handkerchief
noxioushandkerchief.desc: A handkerchief soaked in a strange chemical. It probably belongs to someone who is callous in their methods.

oldcleaningcloth.name: Old Cleaning Cloth
oldcleaningcloth.desc: An old cleaning cloth with a Crest-like design. It probably belongs to someone who worked for a noble house.

oldfishingrod.name: Old Fishing Rod
oldfishingrod.desc: A well-used fishing rod with no hook. It probably belongs to a fisher who doesn't care about how much they catch.

oldmapofenbarr.name: Old Map of Enbarr
oldmapofenbarr.desc: An old map of Enbarr. It probably belongs to someone with a connection to the Imperial capital of the past.

pegasushorseshoes.name: Pegasus Horseshoes
pegasushorseshoes.desc: Special horseshoes commonly used by Pegasus Knights. They probably belong to someone who values chivalry.

portraitofrhea.name: Portrait of Rhea
portraitofrhea.desc: A portrait of Rhea made for a believer. It probably belongs to someone with an emotional attachment to Rhea.

princessdoll.name: Princess Doll
princessdoll.desc: A doll that was hidden in a leather bag for magic tools. It probably belongs to someone who secretly loves dolls.

rareitemindex.name: Rare Item Index
rareitemindex.desc: A list of rare items in Fódlan. It probably belongs to someone with a deep interest in rare things...

repellentpowder.name: Repellent Powder
repellentpowder.desc: A powder derived from insect-repellent flowers. It probably belongs to someone who hates bugs.

schoolofsorcerybook.name: School of Sorcery Book
schoolofsorcerybook.desc: A textbook from the Kingdom's School of Sorcery. It probably belongs to someone who went to that school.

secretledger.name: Secret Ledger
secretledger.desc: Countless numbers are listed in this ledger. It probably belongs to someone deeply involved in commerce.

seirosscriptures.name: Seiros Scriptures
seirosscriptures.desc: A book of old scriptures engraved with the Crest of Seiros It probably belongs to someone affiliated with the church.

shinystriatedpebble.name: Shiny Striated Pebble
shinystriatedpebble.desc: A small stone streaked with colorful lines. It probably belongs to someone who likes collecting pebbles.

silkhandkercheif.name: Silk Handkercheif
silkhandkercheif.desc: A fine white silk handkerchief. It probably belongs to a noble who cares about their personal grooming.

silvernecklace.name: Silver Necklace
silvernecklace.desc: A silver necklace engraved with the Crest of Seiros. It probably belongs to a devout believer.

silverbrooch.name: Silver Brooch
silverbrooch.desc: A broach depicting the Mittlefrank Opera Company logo. It probably belongs to someone involved with the opera.

sketchofasigil.name: Sketch of a Sigil
sketchofasigil.desc: A drawing of a circle used to activate magic. It probably belongs to someone interested in magic and Crests.

smalltannedhide.name: Small Tanned Hide
smalltannedhide.desc: A small animal's hide which has been meticulously tanned. It probably belongs to a skilled hunter.

snappedwritingquill.name: Snapped Writing Quill
snappedwritingquill.desc: A writing quill that has snapped from overuse. It probably belongs to someone who does lots of paperwork.

songstressposter.name: Songstress Poster
songstressposter.desc: A poster promoting Manuela, the "Miracle Songstress." It probably belongs to someone who looks up to her.

spotlessbandage.name: Spotless Bandage
spotlessbandage.desc: A bandage that is clean depite being used. It probably belongs to someone who was slacking on their training.

stiffhandwrap.name: Stiff Hand Wrap
stiffhandwrap.desc: A hand bandage splotched with blood, as though used in a fist fight. It probably belongs to a seasoned brawler.

stilllifepicture.name: Still-Life Picture
stilllifepicture.desc: A still-life painting that features an unusual flower. It probably belongs to someone who is fond of art.

suspiciousdice.name: Suspicious Dice
suspiciousdice.desc: Dice that always produce the same results when thrown. They probably belong to a skilled swindler.

swordbeltfragment.name: Sword Belt Fragment
swordbeltfragment.desc: A metal piece from a sword belt that broke due to wear. It probably belongs to someone who is devoted to training.

tatteredovercoat.name: Tattered Overcoat
tatteredovercoat.desc: An overcoat with many holes and tears. It probably belongs to someone who often finds themselves in fights.

thehistoryofsreng.name: The History of Sreng
thehistoryofsreng.desc: A book recording the history of the Sreng people. It probably belongs to someone who has ties to Sreng.

thesaintsrevealed.name: The Saints Revealed
thesaintsrevealed.desc: An unofficial account of the Four Saints' deeds during the War of Heroes. It probably belongs to a history buff.

thunderbrandreplica.name: Thunderbrand Replica
thunderbrandreplica.desc: A training sword modeled after Thunderbrand. It probably belongs to someone who is enthusiastic about training.

timewornquillpen.name: Time-worn Quill Pen
timewornquillpen.desc: Writing utensil adorned with a beautiful black feather. It probably belongs to someone who often writes letters.

tootheddagger.name: Toothed Dagger
tootheddagger.desc: A uniquely shaped dagger, the back of which is toothed. It probably belongs to someone who likes rare weapons.

traininglogbook.name: Training Logbook
traininglogbook.desc: A detailed record of someone's combat training. It probably belongs to someone who trains relentlessly.

unfinishedfable.name: Unfinished Fable
unfinishedfable.desc: A children's fable that ends partway through. It probably belongs to someone who likes writing stories.

unfinishedscore.name: Unfinished Score
unfinishedscore.desc: Score music with unusual lyrics written in by hand. It probably belongs to someone who likes to sing.

unusedlipstick.name: Unused Lipstick
unusedlipstick.desc: Lipstick that would make an ideal gift for a young lady. It probably belongs to someone who likes wooing women.

usedbottleofperfume.name: Used Bottle of Perfume
usedbottleofperfume.desc: A bottle containing a rare perfume. It probably belongs to someone who is particular about fashion.

waxdipthych.name: Wax Dipthych
waxdipthych.desc: A wax diptych that has been thoroughly used. It probably belongs to someone who is zealous about studying.

weatheredcloak.name: Weathered Cloak
weatheredcloak.desc: A thick, but rather worn-out cloak. It probably belongs to someone who battles enemies outdoors.

whiteglove.name: White Glove
whiteglove.desc: A pure white glove sewn from high-quality material. It seems like something that Edelgard would own.

wellnessherbs.name: Wellness Herbs
wellnessherbs.desc: Herbs that aid with persistent headaches. They probably belong to an adult with a taste for liquor.

wellusedhatchet.name: Well-Used Hatchet
wellusedhatchet.desc: A hatchet with a wide variety of potential uses. It probably belongs to someone who frequently works outside.

wellwornhammock.name: Well-Worn Hammock
wellwornhammock.desc: A Dadgan cot for sleeping outside. It probably belongs to someone with a history of roaming from place to place.

woodenbutton.name: Wooden Button
woodenbutton.desc: A button that seems to have popped off a man's shirt. It probably belongs to someone with a large physique.

woodenflask.name: Wooden Flask
woodenflask.desc: A flask that gives off a strong alcoholic smell when opened. You seem to recall Jeralt keeping it on his person.

nimbuscharm.name: Nimbus Charm
nimbuscharm.desc: A cursed charm said to summon clouds. Its efficacy is dubious. Likely belongs to someone who avoids sunlight.

flaynsbait.name: Flayn's Bait
flaynsbait.desc: Bait given to you by Flayn to catch your first fish! Try it out at the fishing pond.

insectlarva.name: Insect Larva
insectlarva.desc: All-purpose bait that often attracts everyday fish.

pondsnail.name: Pond Snail
pondsnail.desc: Freshwater snail that occasionally attracts uncommon fish.

earthworm.name: Earthworm
earthworm.desc: A wriggling bait, optimal for catching uncommon fish.

blowfly.name: Blowfly
blowfly.desc: A favorable bait that is optimal for hooking extremely rare fish.

herringbait.name: Herring Bait
herringbait.desc: Live small fish bait that attracts extremely rare fish.

deduesseeds.name: Dedue's Seeds
deduesseeds.desc: Seeds given to you by Dedue to grow a vegetable for him. Try planting them in the greenhouse.

mixedfruitseeds.name: Mixed Fruit Seeds
mixedfruitseeds.desc: A mixture of various seeds. It's a mystery what they are until they've fully sprouted!.

mixedherbseeds.name: Mixed Herb Seeds
mixedherbseeds.desc: A handful of mixed herbal seeds. Plant them in the greenhouse to see what becomes of them!.

rootvegetableseeds.name: Root Vegetable Seeds
rootvegetableseeds.desc: A sprinkling of mixed root vegetable seeds. You won't know which types until you plant them.

vegetableseeds.name: Vegetable Seeds
vegetableseeds.desc: Mixed vegetable seeds. Results may vary.

westernfodlanseeds.name: Western Fódlan Seeds
westernfodlanseeds.desc: Mixed seeds foraged from the western region of Fódlan.

easternfodlanseeds.name: Eastern Fódlan Seeds
easternfodlanseeds.desc: These mixed seeds have been gathered from the eastern regions of Fódlan.

albineanseeds.name: Albinean Seeds
albineanseeds.desc: A mixture of seeds that have been foraged from Albinea.

northernfodlanseeds.name: Northern Fódlan Seeds
northernfodlanseeds.desc: Mixed seeds foraged from the northern region of Fódlan.

southernfodlanseeds.name: Southern Fódlan Seeds
southernfodlanseeds.desc: Mixed seeds foraged from the southern region of Fódlan.

blueflowerseeds.name: Blue Flower Seeds
blueflowerseeds.desc: A palmful of seeds that will grow bright blue flowers.

paleblueflowerseeds.name: Pale-Blue Flower Seeds
paleblueflowerseeds.desc: These seeds yield brillient, aqua flowers.

purpleflowerseeds.name: Purple Flower Seeds
purpleflowerseeds.desc: These seeds yield deep purple flowers.

redflowerseeds.name: Red Flower Seeds
redflowerseeds.desc: Rich red flowers sprout from these seeds when planted.

greenflowerseeds.name: Green Flower Seeds
greenflowerseeds.desc: Seeds that grow earthy green flowers.

yellowflowerseeds.name: Yellow Flower Seeds
yellowflowerseeds.desc: A handful of seeds that grow vibrant yellow flowers.

whiteflowerseeds.name: White Flower Seeds
whiteflowerseeds.desc: Bright white flowers will grow from these seeds.

morfisplumseeds.name: Morfis-Plum Seeds
morfisplumseeds.desc: Seeds derived from Morfis plums. Planting them will yield Morfis plums.

nordsalatseeds.name: Nordsalat Seeds
nordsalatseeds.desc: Seeds derived from nordsalat. Planting them will yield nordsalat.

angelicaseeds.name: Angelica Seeds
angelicaseeds.desc: Hand-selected seeds taken from the angelica plant. Plant these to grow more angelica.

boafruitseeds.name: Boa-Fruit Seeds
boafruitseeds.desc: Seeds derived from boa fruit. Planting them will yield boa fruit.

smithingstone.name: Smithing Stone
smithingstone.desc: A basic smithing material. Can be used to repair broken weapons.

blacksandsteel.name: Black-Sand Steel
blacksandsteel.desc: A smithing material that strengthens a weapon's critical attack.

arcanecrystal.name: Arcane Crystal
arcanecrystal.desc: A smithing material that glows with magical light.

agarthium.name: Agarthium
agarthium.desc: A smithing material refined using archaic methods.

wootzsteel.name: Wootz Steel
wootzsteel.desc: A smithing material that is both light and durable.

mythril.name: Mythril
mythril.desc: A smithing material blessed with holy might.

umbralsteel.name: Umbral Steel
umbralsteel.desc: A smithing material steeped in the power of darkness.

venomstone.name: Venomstone
venomstone.desc: A highly toxic smithing material that should be handled with great care.

carassius.name: Carassius
carassius.desc: This small fish is common to all regions of Fódlan. It is somehow connected to Saint Cethleann.

airmidgoby.name: Airmid Goby
airmidgoby.desc: A small fish found throughout the waters of Fódlan. These fish can be eaten but aren't particularly tasty...

caledoniancrayfish.name: Caledonian Crayfish
caledoniancrayfish.desc: A hard-shelled crayfish that hides beneath pebbles in rapid water. Can be used when you share a meal.

albineanherring.name: Albinean Herring
albineanherring.desc: An intense swimmer who migrates over vast distances near the coast of Albinea. Can be used when you share a meal.

teutatesloach.name: Teutates Loach
teutatesloach.desc: A stately bearded fish from Lake Teutates. Can be used when you share a meal.

whitetrout.name: White Trout
whitetrout.desc: A stark white fish that gleams in sunlight. Can be used when you share a meal.

airmidpike.name: Airmid Pike
airmidpike.desc: This fish is commonly found in the Airmid River. Can be used when you share a meal.

caledoniangar.name: Caledonian Gar
caledoniangar.desc: This fish has very hard scales, signifying its origins on the Caledonian Plateau. Can be used when you share a meal.

silverfish.name: Silverfish
silverfish.desc: A somewhat costly fish that glimmers like polished silver.

goldenfish.name: Golden Fish
goldenfish.desc: Glittering gold, this fish boasts a high cost.

queenloach.name: Queen Loach
queenloach.desc: A beautiful specimen, even among Teutates loaches. Cook into a dish to boost dexterity.

teutatespike.name: Teutates Pike
teutatespike.desc: This fish is a cross between loaches and pikes spawned in Lake Teutates. Cook into a dish that boosts defense.

bullhead.name: Bullhead
bullhead.desc: This fish has a hard head that is used for defending itself against predators. Cook into a dish that boosts speed.

platinumfish.name: Platinum Fish
platinumfish.desc: This pricey fish shines like pure white silver.

fodlandy.name: Fódlandy
fodlandy.desc: Challenging to ensnare, this ancient fish has swum in the waters of Fódlan for countless generations.

goddessmessenger.name: Goddess Messenger
goddessmessenger.desc: Appears only when the water shines with spectral light... Cook into a dish that boosts dexterity, speed, and defense.

driedvegetables.name: Dried Vegetables
driedvegetables.desc: Parched vegetables that are no longer useful for cooking.

weeds.name: Weeds
weeds.desc: Common weeds. Not much to look at, and not of much use either.

zanadofruit.name: Zanado Fruit
zanadofruit.desc: A simple fruit found in Zanado that is ill tasting and inedible.

cabbage.name: Cabbage
cabbage.desc: Cabbage of Fódlan that is enjoyed in a number of dishes. Can be used when you share a meal.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.desc: A simple carrot grown in Fódlan that adds texture to any recipe. Can be used when you share a meal.

chickpeas.name: Chickpeas
chickpeas.desc: Chickpeas harvested throughout Fódlan. Can be used when you share a meal.

noafruit.name: Noa Fruit
noafruit.desc: A fruit named after Saint Noa. It takes a skilled hand to extract the pulp. Can be used when you share a meal.

onion.name: Onion
onion.desc: A Fódlan oniona staple in many dishes. Can be used when you share a meal.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.desc: A rare vegetable from Dagda that requires delicate conditions to thrive. Can be used when you share a meal.

turnip.name: Turnip
turnip.desc: A Fódlan turnip. Tasty and earthy. Can be used when you share a meal.

albineanberries.name: Albinean Berries
albineanberries.desc: Simple Albinean berries that are tart with a hint of sweetness. Can be used when you share a meal.

peachcurrant.name: Peach Currant
peachcurrant.desc: Sweet peach currants. Can be used when you share a meal.

verona.name: Verona
verona.desc: Blessed by the goddess herself, this vegetable is as tasty as it is beautiful. Can be used when you share a meal.

magdredkirsch.name: Magdred Kirsch
magdredkirsch.desc: A shimmering fruit, warm and glowing with Magdred magics. Can be cooked into a dish.

morfisplum.name: Morfis Plum
morfisplum.desc: It is said that mages of old infused these plums with their spells. Cook into a dish that boosts luck.

nordsalat.name: Nordsalat
nordsalat.desc: A magical vegetable that grows in frigid, unyielding environments. Cook into a dish that boosts charm.

ailellgrass.name: Ailell Grass
ailellgrass.desc: This rare fiery-colored grass thrives in the harsh environs of Ailell and is sold for a high price.

angelica.name: Angelica
angelica.desc: This unearthly vegetable is purportedly grown from the blood of fallen heroes. Cook into a dish that boosts magic.

boafruit.name: Boa Fruit
boafruit.desc: Serpentine scales of this fruit protect the delectable pulp nestled within. Cook into a dish that boosts resistance.

zanadotreasurefruit.name: Zanado Treasure Fruit
zanadotreasurefruit.desc: A prized fruit as red as blood that grows in Zanado. Cook into a dish that boosts magic and resistance.

poultry.name: Poultry
poultry.desc: Meat from birds hunted in the hills. Can be used when you share a meal.

wildgame.name: Wild Game
wildgame.desc: Meat from beasts hunted in the hills. Can be used when you share a meal.

duscurbear.name: Duscur Bear
duscurbear.desc: Meat from rare bears of Duscur with a dense flavor profile. Cook into a dish that raises a unit's max HP.

oghmawolverine.name: Oghma Wolverine
oghmawolverine.desc: This meat is taken from fleet-footed beasts found in the Oghma Mountains. Cook into a dish that boosts strength.

albineanmoose.name: Albinean Moose
albineanmoose.desc: Albinean moose meathighly prized in Fódlan and rare to find. Cook into a dish that raises max HP and strength.

teaofthesaints.name: Tea of the Saints
teaofthesaints.desc: Even commoners have tried this cost-efficient tea, which is a mixture of herbs. It's a tad bitter.

sweetappleblend.name: Sweet-Apple Blend
sweetappleblend.desc: A tea blended with two types of apple peels. Elegant and sweet, it is popular among common folk and nobles alike.

albineanberryblend.name: Albinean Berry Blend
albineanberryblend.desc: Dried Albinean berries give this black tea its fragrance. The sweet, relaxing scent is popular among many.

southernfruitblend.name: Southern Fruit Blend
southernfruitblend.desc: A blend with a unique dried fruit from the south. Popular for its intoxicatingly strong, bright notes.

mintleaves.name: Mint Leaves
mintleaves.desc: An invigorating mint blend that revitalizes and refreshes all who partake.

almondblend.name: Almond Blend
almondblend.desc: A refined, nutty tea that is blended with leaves and thinly sliced almonds.

gingertea.name: Ginger Tea
gingertea.desc: The sharp spiciness of ginger laces the body of this tea, unforgettable and brightening.

angelicatea.name: Angelica Tea
angelicatea.desc: A cleansing herbal tea blended with angelica.

almyranpineneedles.name: Almyran Pine Needles
almyranpineneedles.desc: This tea is comprised of oxidized pine needles from eastern Almyra, giving it a distinct, earthy tone.

crescentmoontea.name: Crescent-Moon Tea
crescentmoontea.desc: Fermented dried seeds blended with tea leaves. It has a soft and subtle flavor, akin to the gentle light of the moon.

honeyedfruitblend.name: Honeyed-Fruit Blend
honeyedfruitblend.desc: A candied blend made up of dried, honeyed fruits. For anyone with a sweet tooth, this tea can't be beat.

lavenderblend.name: Lavender Blend
lavenderblend.desc: Tiny dried purple lavandula flowers are sprinkled into this refreshing floral tea.

chamomile.name: Chamomile
chamomile.desc: A stark white floral tea with bright notes, this blend calms nerves and heightens concentration.

bergamot.name: Bergamot
bergamot.desc: The bright notes of this tea stem from an infusion of citrus oils. This blend is highly favored by nobility.

cinnamonblend.name: Cinnamon Blend
cinnamonblend.desc: An aromatic bark blend referred to as the king of spices. Its unique taste appeals to similarly unique people.

dagdafruitblend.name: Dagda Fruit Blend
dagdafruitblend.desc: A stark, bitter fruit from Dagda makes this black tea particularly pungent. Connoisseurs enjoy its unique flavor.

rosepetalblend.name: Rose Petal Blend
rosepetalblend.desc: Black tea laced with rose petals. A classic floral blend often enjoyed among Kingdom and Alliance nobles.

seirostea.name: Seiros Tea
seirostea.desc: A black tea common to the south of Almyra, it is fairly basic in its flavors. This is its common name in Fódlan.

fourspiceblend.name: Four-Spice Blend
fourspiceblend.desc: A novelty tea blended with four unique spices inspired by the Four Saints. Enjoyment requires a mature palate.

hresvelgblend.name: Hresvelg Blend
hresvelgblend.desc: A high-quality blend of leaves procured specially for House Hresvelg. Its refined flavor brings sheer bliss.

leicestercortania.name: Leicester Cortania
leicestercortania.desc: A specialty tea from the Alliance blended with a variety of leaves from the east. This tea is of the utmost quality.

trainingsword+.name: Training Sword+
trainingsword+.desc: A reinforced training sword, for those who take their training seriously.

ironsword+.name: Iron Sword+
ironsword+.desc: Reinforced in the forge's flames, this iron sword shines with a new brilliance.

steelsword+.name: Steel Sword+
steelsword+.desc: A reinforced steel sword made strong and remade stronger.

silversword+.name: Silver Sword+
silversword+.desc: A reinforced silver sword, born again on the blacksmith's anvil.

rapier+.name: Rapier+
rapier+.desc: An elegant reinforced rapier, put to good use against armored and cavalry units.

armorslayer+.name: Armorslayer+
armorslayer+.desc: A reinforced armorslayer, designed specifically for taking out armored units.

devilsword+.name: Devil Sword+
devilsword+.desc: A reinforced devil sword that inflicts 10 damage on the wielded after combat.

killingedge+.name: Killing Edge+
killingedge+.desc: This reinforced killing edge has a high critical hit rate and has been sharpened to take down foes.

levinsword+.name: Levin Sword+
levinsword+.desc: A reinforced levin sword. Magic weapon.

wodao+.name: Wo Dao+
wodao+.desc: This reinforced wo dao has a high critical-hit rate and it perfectly crafted to swiftly kill foes.

cursedashiyasword+.name: Cursed Ashiya Sword+
cursedashiyasword+.desc: This reinforced Cursed Ashiya Sword injures its wielder, inflicting 5 damage after combat.

bravesword+.name: Brave Sword+
bravesword+.desc: A reinforced brave sword that lets the wielder attack twice when initiating combat.

swordofzoltan+.name: Sword of Zoltan+
swordofzoltan+.desc: A reinforced Sword of Zoltan, created by a legendary artisan and revitalized for a new age.

traininglance+.name: Training Lance+
traininglance+.desc: A reinforced training lance, for those who take their training seriously.

ironlance+.name: Iron Lance+
ironlance+.desc: Reinforced in the forge's flames, this iron lance shines with a new brilliance.

steellance+.name: Steel Lance+
steellance+.desc: A reinforced steel lance made strong and remade stronger.

silverlance+.name: Silver Lance+
silverlance+.desc: A reinforced silver lance, born again on the blacksmith’s anvil.

javelin+.name: Javelin+
javelin+.desc: This reinforced Javelin has significant stopping power when thrust or thrown at enemies.

horseslayer+.name: Horseslayer+
horseslayer+.desc: An equine nightmare, this refined horseslayer is effective against cavalry units.

killerlance+.name: Killer Lance+
killerlance+.desc: This reinforced killer lance has a high critical hit rate and has been sharpened to take down foes.

shortspear+.name: Short Spear+
shortspear+.desc: A reinforced short spear used for close combat and ranged attacks.

blessedlance+.name: Blessed Lance+
blessedlance+.desc: A reinforced blessed lance that is effective against monsters and restores 15% of HP every turn.

bravelance+.name: Brave Lance+
bravelance+.desc: A reinforced brave lance that lets the wielded attack twice when initiating combat.

spear+.name: Spear+
spear+.desc: A reinforced spear with impressive power used for close- or long-range combat.

crescentsickle+.name: Crescent Sickle+
crescentsickle+.desc: A reinforced crescent sickle with extreme durability.

lanceofzoltan+.name: Lance of Zoltan+
lanceofzoltan+.desc: A reinforced Lance of Zoltan, created by a legendary artisan and revitalized for a new age.

trainingaxe+.name: Training Axe+
trainingaxe+.desc: A reinforced training axe, for those who take their training seriously.

ironaxe+.name: Iron Axe+
ironaxe+.desc: Reinforced in the forge's flames, this iron axe shines with a new brilliance.

steelaxe+.name: Steel Axe+
steelaxe+.desc: A reinforced steel axe made strong and remade stronger.

silveraxe+.name: Silver Axe+
silveraxe+.desc: A reinforced silver axe, born again on the blacksmith’s anvil.

mace+.name: Mace+
mace+.desc: Reinforced mace with greater bludgeoning power that is effective against armored units.

hammer+.name: Hammer+
hammer+.desc: A reinforced hammer that rends metal. It is especially effective against armored units.

handaxe+.name: Hand Axe+
handaxe+.desc: A reinforced hand axe that causes significant damage when swung or hurled at enemies.

devilaxe+.name: Devil Axe+
devilaxe+.desc: A reinforced devil axe that inflicts 10 damage on the wielder after combat.

killeraxe+.name: Killer Axe+
killeraxe+.desc: This reinforced killer axe has a high critical hit rate and has been sharpened to take down foes.

shortaxe+.name: Short Axe+
shortaxe+.desc: A reinforced short axe used for close combat and ranged attacks.

braveaxe+.name: Brave Axe+
braveaxe+.desc: A reinforced brave axe that lets the wielder attack twice when initiating combat.

boltaxe+.name: Bolt Axe+
boltaxe+.desc: A reinforced bolt axe. Magic weapon.

tomahawk+.name: Tomahawk+
tomahawk+.desc: A reinforced tomahawk with impressive power used for close- or long-ranged combat.

axeofzoltan+.name: Axe of Zoltan+
axeofzoltan+.desc: A reinforced Axe of Zoltan, created by a legendary artisan and revitalized for a new age. Effective against Armored foes.

trainingbow+.name: Training Bow+
trainingbow+.desc: A reinforced training bow, for those who take training seriously.

ironbow+.name: Iron Bow+
ironbow+.desc: Reinforced in the forge's flames, this iron bow shines with a new brilliance.

steelbow+.name: Steel Bow+
steelbow+.desc: A reinforced steel bow made strong and remade stronger.

silverbow+.name: Silver Bow+
silverbow+.desc: A reinforced silver bow, born again on the blacksmith's anvil.

minibow+.name: Mini Bow+
minibow+.desc: A reinforced mini bow. Cannot make a follow-up attack at 1 space away.

longbow+.name: Longbow+
longbow+.desc: A powerful and durable longbow that has been reinforced.

killerbow+.name: Killer Bow+
killerbow+.desc: This reinforced killer bow has a high critical hit rate and has been sharpened to take down foes.

blessedbow+.name: Blessed Bow+
blessedbow+.desc: A reinforced blessed bow that is effective against monsters and restores 15% of HP every turn.

bravebow+.name: Brave Bow+
bravebow+.desc: A reinforced brave bow that lets the wielder attack twice when initiating combat.

magicbow+.name: Magic Bow+
magicbow+.desc: A reinforced magic bow, enhanced for increased magic potential.

bowofzoltan+.name: Bow of Zoltan+
bowofzoltan+.desc: A reinforced Bow of Zoltan, created by a legendary artisan and revitalized for a new age.

traininggauntlets+.name: Training Gauntlets+
traininggauntlets+.desc: Reinforced training gauntlets for serious training, wearer attacks twice when initiating combat.

irongauntlets+.name: Iron Gauntlets+
irongauntlets+.desc: Reinforced in the forge's flames, wearer attacks twice when initiating combat.

steelgauntlets+.name: Steel Gauntlets+
steelgauntlets+.desc: Reinforced steel gauntlets remade stronger, wearer attacks twice when initiating combat.

silvergauntlets+.name: Silver Gauntlets+
silvergauntlets+.desc: Reinforced silver gauntlets reborn on the anvil, wearer attacks twice when initiating combat.

killergauntlets+.name: Killer Gauntlets+
killergauntlets+.desc: Reinforced killer knuckles, for deadly brawling. Wielder attacks twice when initiating combat.

auraknuckles+.name: Aura Knuckles+
auraknuckles+.desc: Reinforced aura knuckles infused with magic. Wielder can attack twice when imitiating combat,

dragonclaws+.name: Dragon Claws+
dragonclaws+.desc: Reinforced Dragon Claws, effective against dragons. Strike twice when initiating combat.
